name: Demo: JackQuest - The Tale of The Sword
name_original: Demo: JackQuest - The Tale of The Sword
description:
demo version A Great Adventure JackQuest is a Action 2D Platform Game 
  • Collect crystals to save your progress
  • Jump off or slide down walls
  • Without separeted levels, explore a giant cave
  • Find hidden objects
  • Get new items to explore new areas
  • An exciting story!
Controls

Keyboard

  • Z: Jump
  • X: Action Attack 1
  • C: Action Attack 2

GamePad

  • A: Jump
  • X: Action Attack 1
  • B: Action Attack 2
